input.content: You are assisting in transliterating English to Urdu. You'll be given a sentence in Roman Urdu, and your task is to translate it to Urdu. Only provide the resulting Urdu sentence and nothing else. Don't add any tajweed like zabar, zer, pesh.
Meri Khamoshi Hi Mera Afsana Keh Rahi Hai

ideal: میری خاموشی ہی میرا افسانہ کہہ رہی ہے
